column2: "/ci1 1 Hey, over here! This is bad, this is really bad! Looks like Patty n' Tia's reputation has preceded us!"
"/ci1 2 Alright, all clear! Now get going! You two have a job to do! Leave this place to us!"
"Gah... Patty n' Tia can't be beaten like this..."

"Sorry, everyone...
Just be careful when you're stepping over my body..."
"Just you watch me, Tia! Your big sister will handle all these enemies by herself!"
